Our room was beautiful with 3 beds, a private bathroom, an ornately painted ceiling, and a large beautiful window. Antonella, the head of the staff, was absolutely lovely and extremely helpful. We were in contact with her over email before arriving about directions to the hotel and the best way to get around Rome. She gave us great advice so we could get travel passes the first day. A wonderful breakfast was served to our room every morning and the staff did a fabulous cleaning job of our rooms every day. Antonella was always helpful in showing us the best way to see the sights of Rome and even booked a tour for us upon our request. They went above and beyond when Antonella bought a bouquet of flowers for one of our group who was having a birthday. The hotel itself is in a very central location, too. It's very close to the metro and within walking distance of nearly everything in the center of Rome! We had a wonderful time at this hotel and will definitely stay here in the future!

Reviews.Title: “excellentooo”
Reviews.Author: nikituska
Reviews.Content: The hotel is nice, clean and staff is really fantastic ( very helpfull and friendly ).To find the hotel was a bit tricky but with a help of locals it was no problem. It is situated about ten minutes walk from Termini Station which is fantastic and about two minutes walk from local Metro station which was very convenient to get to Vatican for example.Nice leisure walk from the hotel to all sightseeing parts like Coloseum or Spanish steps, Trevi Fountain etc..Breakfast delicious.Overall we had such a nice stay there and when back we would return to the same hotel,special thank you and kisses to Antonella and Fabro.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location, friendly service and value for money ****”
Reviews.Author: blueskymum
Reviews.Content: I stayed 3 nights in this private hotel. It is centrally located 1 block from St Maggiore Piazza and Cathedrale, the double decker bus stop and a 15 min walk to the Centrale railway. The hotel is on the 3rd floor of a building, you buzz at street level but staff were on duty to unlock when I buzzed on arrival about 10pm. The owner Fabrio was friendly and helpful, making me a cup of tea and snack when I arrived , which was very welcome after a long trip. You get your own keys when you check in. The room was small, but renovated, clean and functional. The heating was on for my arrival, and there was a modern ensuite. Each morning I called reception when I was ready and a light breakfast of juice, tea/coffee pastries or toast was brought in. The bed was comfortable and the only issue I had was that my room was next to reception and not sound proofed, but being tired after a days sight seeing in Rome, who worries about phones and voices in reception? Travelling on my own I felt quite safe there and the staff were very willing to help with bookings, taxis, information and directions- even giving the hotel card to call if I got lost or had any trouble. Its great value -I paid about 60 eu per night, and if you are a return visitor Fabrio will do you a good deal- ie a quieter room, at the online booking rate.

Reviews.Title: “Staying at this hotel could be compared with visiting your close family”
Reviews.Author: Fadrayman
Reviews.Content: Staying at this hotel could be compared with visiting your close family and not a commercial hotel, in a positive way. I work at the Norwegian Railways as Leader of Maintenance Managers / engineers, which implies that I travel rather frequently to and outside Europe. Last year I had 150 hotel nights at various hotels. My wife and I travelled to Paris at the same time last year and we had our “guards” up thanks to French impoliteness. We were mentally prepared that we could be subjected to rudeness and “racism” as we experienced in France (not once but 5 times within a stay of 3 days). It was rather warm when we arrived in Rome and after some back and forth we finally arrived to this hotel. Upon arrival it seemed as if we have come home to our favorite aunt or close friends. The staff was extraordinarily polite, humble, helpful, considerate and extremely hospitable. My wife and I both said that thanks to the kind hotel staff our vacation got a pleasant jump start. Breakfast in bed, tourism guide and tips, smiling faces, personal connection are few words I can describe this hotel by. The rooms are clean, the washrooms new and you also have an air condition to keep you cool on a warm day. The location is central and you can basically do most of your tourism walking if metro and busses give you a headache. Prices are also reasonable keeping in mind the location. Long story short, this is the hotel you wanna stay at. Italian people carry a rather negative reputation, but trust me, we have never come across such a helpful and friendly nation – we travel to 1 – 3 countries every year.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT SERVICE ,LOCATION ! VERY NICE HOSTEL,”
Reviews.Author: WINYIN
Reviews.Content: The hostel is located very close to the underground station , 30secs to the station next to the termini. very well transport connection .only takes 5MIns to the termini station . Most importantly , the owner was very nice and helpful , she gives us lots of travel information as well as the planning of our 4days staying. The room was great and tidy, with very wide and open window , very bright and clean room :DA very brillent hotel! I would highly recommend this hotel to all of you.

Reviews.Title: “Great hospitality, great location, great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Wiskoosh
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel 4 nights during March 2010. First and for most the staff is wonderfull! Antonella was super friendly and helpful beginning wih the booking and of course during our stay. We were given a great introduction to the city and the sites by Giorgio. Antonella gave us great recomendaions for restaurants around the hotel. The staff gladly helped us with every request we had.The rooms are ery clean. The location is geat - 10 minute walk fron the Termini station, right by the Vitorio Emanuele metro station and a short walk from the Coloseum. Be sure to ask for directions to the hotel before arriving as it is dificult to find otherwise. The hotel is very good value for money and I would recommend it to any one coming to Rome!

Reviews.Title: “Selkirk Jolly Boys (and wives!!) head over to Rome for 6 Nations”
Reviews.Author: MrJollyBoy
Reviews.Content: 12 members of Selkirk Cricket Club headed over to Rome to watch the sporting spectacle that was Italia vs Scotzia in the RBS 6 Nations. The Auditorium Di Mecenate is really handy for arriving into Statzione Termini and the metro is just round the corner. There is also a cracking wee restaurant below serving decent food and drink at reasonable prices. The hotel staff were excellent, and the rooms were also just what was needed, especially considering the price. This is a perfect hotel for a group of pals on a trip.

Reviews.Title: “The best the people”
Reviews.Author: jecpty
Reviews.Content: This place satisfied all my needs during vacations in Rome.The better is the people they made everything to help and give us tips to have a good stay in the city. Metro station is close,neighborhood doesn't look so good but have any problems at all.
